15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <confgen/os.h>
20
21#include <fcntl.h>
22#include <unistd.h>
23#include <sys/types.h>
24#include <pwd.h>
25#include <errno.h>
26#include <stdio.h>
27#include <sys/stat.h>
28
29int
30set_user(FILE *fd, const char *user) {
31 struct passwd *pw;
32
33 pw = getpwnam(user);
34 if (pw == NULL) {
35 errno = EINVAL;
36 return (-1);
37 }
38 return (fchown(fileno(fd), pw->pw_uid, -1));
39}
40
